title: Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that the internet conection is...
body: So hello , i been playing for 1 year almost and this is my first time i run in to this problem , i just launched LOL and it says the error .. Last time i launched LOL  was like 5 hours ago ..

replies.body: Are you still having this issue or has it been resolved completely?

No , i fixed this by doing this Try deleting your LoL_Air_Client folder (the default install path for this folder is c:\Riot Games\RADS\Projects) and then repatching , it works . Still thx for asking :D i dont know how to lock this

So hello , i searching in internet and i found this Try deleting your LoL_Air_Client folder (the default install path for this folder is c:\Riot Games\RADS\Projects) and then repatching , i did everything hear my lol opened and its downloading the file that i deleted .
